hpnicfBpa.name: hpnicfBpa

revisions.description: The initial version of this MIB file.

hpnicfBpa.description: This MIB contains objects that manage the configuration and information of BGP policy accounting. It accounts IP packets by user defined BGP policy.

hpnicfBpaCfgTable.name: hpnicfBpaCfgTable
hpnicfBpaCfgTable.description: A table for BGP policy accounting configuration.

hpnicfBpaCfgEntry.name: hpnicfBpaCfgEntry
hpnicfBpaCfgEntry.description: An entry for BGP policy accounting configuration.

hpnicfBpaDirection.name: hpnicfBpaDirection
hpnicfBpaDirection.description: Identify the direction of IP packets on which BGP policy accounting takes effect. input :input direction output :output direction

hpnicfBpaSrcOrDest.name: hpnicfBpaSrcOrDest
hpnicfBpaSrcOrDest.description: Identify IP packet's Destination or Source IP address that BGP policy accounting relies on. source :source IP address of the IP packet destination :destination IP address of the IP packet both :both source and destination IP addresses

hpnicfBpaRowStatus.name: hpnicfBpaRowStatus
hpnicfBpaRowStatus.description: This object manages the creation, deletion, and modification of rows in the hpnicfBpaCfgTable, which supports the active status, createAndGo operation, and destroy operation.

hpnicfBpaStatTable.name: hpnicfBpaStatTable
hpnicfBpaStatTable.description: A table for BGP policy accounting statistics.

hpnicfBpaStatEntry.name: hpnicfBpaStatEntry
hpnicfBpaStatEntry.description: An entry for BGP policy accounting statistics.

hpnicfBpaTrafficType.name: hpnicfBpaTrafficType
hpnicfBpaTrafficType.description: Type of IP packets, IPv4 or IPv6.

hpnicfBpaTrafficIndex.name: hpnicfBpaTrafficIndex
hpnicfBpaTrafficIndex.description: Traffic index generated by a BGP policy.

hpnicfBpaInPacketCount.name: hpnicfBpaInPacketCount
hpnicfBpaInPacketCount.description: The total number of received packets with the specified traffic type and traffic index.

hpnicfBpaInOctetCount.name: hpnicfBpaInOctetCount
hpnicfBpaInOctetCount.description: The total number of received bytes with the specified traffic type and traffic index.

hpnicfBpaOutPacketCount.name: hpnicfBpaOutPacketCount
hpnicfBpaOutPacketCount.description: The total number of output packets with the specified traffic type and traffic index.

hpnicfBpaOutOctetCount.name: hpnicfBpaOutOctetCount
hpnicfBpaOutOctetCount.description: The total number of output bytes with the specified traffic type and traffic index.
